stimulusHtml:
The x axis ranges from negative 4 to 4 in increments of 1. The y axis ranges from negative 20 to 20 in increments of 5. All coordinates are approximate. Moving from left to right:

  • The curve enters the window at (negative 2.8 comma negative 22).
  • The curve increases to cross the x axis at (negative 1.2 comma 0).
  • The curve continues to increase, becoming nearly horizontal at the point (0 comma 2).
  • The curve then increases to pass through (1 comma 3), (2 comma 10), and (2.8 comma 22), where it exits the window.

 

​The graph of the function y=fx{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"} is given. Which of the following is the graph of y=f-1x{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"} ?
choicesHtml:
The x axis ranges from negative 3 to 3 in increments of 1. The y axis ranges from negative 20 to 20 in increments of 5. All coordinates are approximate. Moving from left to right:

  • The curve enters the window at (negative 3.5 comma negative 0.1).
  • The curve nearly follows the x axis and then decreases to reach (negative 1.4 comma negative 0.3).
  • The curve then decreases sharply to exit the window at (negative 1.3 comma negative 22).
  • A second section of the curve enters the window at (negative 1.2 comma 22).
  • The curve decreases sharply to reach (negative 1 comma 1).
  • The curve continues to decrease, nearly following the x axis and exiting the window at (3.5 comma 0.1).

​

The x axis ranges from negative 4 to 4 in increments of 1. The y axis ranges from negative 20 to 20 in increments of 5. All coordinates are approximate. Moving from left to right:

  • The curve enters the window at (negative 2.8 comma 22).
  • The curve decreases to pass through (negative 2 comma 6).
  • The curve crosses the x axis at (negative 1.3 comma 0) and becomes nearly horizontal when reaching (0 comma negative 2).
  • The curve then decreases to (2 comma negative 10) and exits the window at (2.7 comma negative 22).

The x axis ranges from negative 3 to 3 in increments of 1. The y axis ranges from negative 20 to 20 in increments of 5. All coordinates are approximate. Moving from left to right:

  • The curve enters the window at (negative 2.8 comma 22).
  • The curve decreases to pass through (negative 2 comma 10).
  • The curve becomes nearly horizontal when reaching (0 comma 2).
  • The curve decreases to cross the x axis at (1.2 comma 0).
  • The curve then decreases to (2 comma negative 6) and exits the window at (2.8 comma negative 22).

The x axis ranges from negative 20 to 20 in increments of 10. The y axis ranges from negative 4 to 4 in increments of 1. All coordinates are approximate. Moving from left to right:

  • The curve enters the window at (negative 22 comma negative 2.9).
  • The curve increases to (negative 10 comma negative 2.2).
  • The curve continues to increase to cross the y axis at (0 comma negative 1.2).
  • The curve becomes nearly vertical to cross the x axis at (2 comma 0).
  • The curve then continues to increase to (10 comma 2) and (20 comma 2.6), becoming less and less steep.
  • The curve exits the window at (22 comma 2.8).
